body.name: Apricorn 8GB Aegis Secure Key 3 NX 256-bit Encrypted FIPS 140-2 Level 3 Validated Secure USB 3.0 Flash Drive (ASK3-NX-8GB), Black
body.merchantInfo: Ships from and sold by SaveCentral.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 12 hrs 27 mins
body.description: The NeXt Generation of Secure Key: the Aegis Secure Key 3NX Our fourth generation of Secure Keys brings next generation security features, up to 25% cooler operating temperatures, and an even lower cost. Software-Free, 100% hardware-based 256-bit AES XTS encrypted, onboard keypad PIN authenticated, and ultra-fast USB 3.1 (3.0) data transfer speeds. All Data is encrypted on the fly and the device's PINs and Data remain encrypted while the drive is at rest. Completely cross-platform compatible and OS agnostic; thrives in Windows, Linux, Mac, Android, Chrome, embedded systems, and equipment possessing a powered USB port and storage file system. All internal componentry is protected from physical tampering with a layer of hardened epoxy, and locked-down firmware brings immunity to malware attacks such as BadUSB.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Software-Free, 256-Bit AES Hardware-Encrypted USB Innovations Trusted Worldwide for Protecting Sensitive Data. Headquartered in Poway, California, Apricorn provides a comprehensive range of secure USB storage innovations to prominent entities in the categories of finance, healthcare, education, and government throughout North America and the rest of the world. Apricorn products have become the trusted standard for myriad data security strategies worldwide. Founded in 1983, numerous award-winning products have been developed under the Apricorn brand as well as for a number of leading computer manufacturers on an OEM basis. *awards pictured above from 2019

Hardware-Encrypted USB 3.2 Flash keys Featuring a USB Type-A Connector The Aegis Secure Key 3NX is developed to economically and efficiently protect the data of the expanding global remote workforce by delivering all of the advanced security features found in the Aegis family of secure drives in 7 storage capacities ranging from 2GB to 128GB

Program Multiple Aegis Secure Keys Simultaneously with the Aegis Configurator Configure 1, 5, or 50 devices simultaneously, in a matter of seconds. Perfect for configuring devices as part of a high-volume corporate deployment. Quickly establish corporate security across all devices; Create Master Profiles, Customize Device Settings, and Preload Data onto Multiple Apricorn Drives with just a few clicks. Also manage master profiles, edit or add new ones, and search settings history by device from Admin dashboard access.

Built Tough, Inside and Out USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type A Connector Backward compatible with computers, hubs, and equipment possessing USB 1, 2, and 3 ports. Wear-Resistant Rubberized Buttons Polymer-coated and factory tested to defend against abrasion and obscure frequently pressed buttons. Positive-click press confirmation. Rugged Exterior Aluminum external case with hardened epoxy surrounding its internal circuitry to defend against physical tampering. Internal Lithium Battery Authentication occurs prior to connecting to host computer. Auto charges when inserted in a powered USB port.

3NX 3NXC 3Z 3.0 Connector Type USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A Dust / Water Resistance Rating IP68 IP68 IP68 IP68 Security Validation FIPS 140-2 lev. 3 FIPS 140-2 lev. 3 FIPS 140-2 lev. 3 FIPS 140-2 lev. 3 Capacities (GB) 2 | 4 | 8 | 16 | 32 | 64 | 128 4 | 8 | 16 | 32 | 64 | 128 16 | 32 | 64 | 128 16 | 30 | 60 | 120 | 240 | 480 | 1TB

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely worth the price, despite such low space!
reviews.reviewText: So as much as I absolutely love this Aegis flash drive, I want to start off by saying that for the price that these cost, they could have made it in 16 or 32 GB at the very least as memory costs are way down!Now for the rest of the review! You absolutely MUST read ALL of the instructions BEFORE you try to use it. While you’re reading the instructions, plug the device into a USB port and don’t do ANYTHING with it until you’re done with the instructions. This will give time to charge the internal battery.Ease of use: Once you’ve read the instructions, setting up your own passcode is relatively easy and is done right on the device itself WITHOUT it being plugged in (again why it’s so important you charge it first while reading the instructions).This device is packed with soooo many security features that can be 100% customized to YOUR liking. This isn’t an imitation or off-brand device where you stuck using THEIR software or only being able to setup 1 key. You can literally set a self-destruct code so if you have sensitive data and someone is trying to take it, type the code and it wipes itself. NONE of the data is recoverable, even by forensic computer scientists. That’s why Aegis is the #1 preferred by the government.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well but keypad is small
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use and works well. The keypad is small, so it's a touch tricky to use for those with large hands but it's doable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice security storage
reviews.reviewText: I use it to keep sensitive documents on. Keep all your PKI certs on it, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Data Security Product
reviews.reviewText: This secure USB drive is awesome. The data is encrypted and protected with your own custom security code.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Delivered as promised and much appreciated. A little complicated to use, instructions are difficult to follow. Must be persistent with the trial and error approach to be successful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good for sensitive documents.
reviews.reviewText: good for sensitive documents. I put my tax returns and crap like that on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you think you need one, you absolutely do!
reviews.reviewText: Around my house, we call this the "Death Key". My wife and I travel frequently, and all of our sons know the PIN for the key. We are storing backups of our passwords, encryption keys, certificates, and instructions for the boys to get the will and whom to contact in case we don't come back from one of our trips.Between physical and technical security, I don't fear the information getting out to 3rd parties, nor do I fear that our kids will be locked out of our accounts if our ship goes sinks, or a Semi cuts us off on the freeway.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Secure way to store important documents
reviews.reviewText: I have used Apricorn products for many years. This secure flash drive is the perfect way to store important personal documents. In the event it is needed, passcode can be left for family to access any stored documents like wills, POA’s, Advanced directives, financial info while knowing the data is secured with your own custom passcode. Easily toss into your fireproof safe, lockbox or safe deposit box.Only down side is a little pricy for the capacity.
clé non reconnue ni par un pc ni par un Mac

Ho acquistato questo USB Drive Criptato per sostituire uno che possedevo e che non era dotato di tastiera.La qualità costruttiva è altissima. Tutto il corpo dello USB Drive è in alluminio molto solido.I tasti in gomma sono di qualità elevata e questo mi fa pensare ad una lunga durata nel tempo.Tutta la programmazione del drive si effettua tramite i tasti ed è spiegata molto bene nel manuale disponibile in diverse lingue.Questo USB drive è dotato di batteria interna che permette di sbloccarlo prima di inserirlo nella porta USB del PC.La velocità di trasferimento è molto elevata infatti supporta lo standard USB 3.Uitlizzo questo USB drive in combinazione con PortableApps così posso avere le app che uso maggiormente installate nello USB driver.L'applicazione che uso maggiormente è KeePass per custodire tutte le mie password e chiavi pubbliche che utilizzo per collegarmi tramite SSH ai miei server.Una caratteristicha che apprezzo molto è la possibilità di utilizzare lo USB Driver anche con le macchine virtuali.Infatti normalmente, appena il drive USB viene rimosso da Windows (senza rimuove fisicamente il drive USB) il drive USB si blocca. Questo meccanismo di sicurezza ne impedisce l'utilizzo con le macchine virtuali perchè, quando il drive usb viene connesso alla macchina virtuale viene ri-enumerato e questo provoca il blocco dell'unità.Fortunatamente è possibile disabilitare questa funzione ed il drive USB potrà essere utilizzato anche con macchine virtuali.Un'altra caratteristica positiva è che il drive USB può essere utilizzato con tutti i dispositivi che sono in grado di leggere drive USB (PC Windows/Linux/Mac, Android). Infatti, grazie al tastierino e alla batteria, il drive viene sbloccato prima dell'inserimento nel dispositivo host e viene visto da quest'ultimo come un comune drive USB.Se proprio devo trovare un difetto, il tappo del drive USB non mi ha entusiasmato. Il corpo del tappo è in alluminio come il drive USB ma vi sono state applicate, alle estremità, delle guarnizioni in gomma. Spero che queste guarnizioni rimangano incollate nel tempo.Nel complesso un ottimo prodotto e ne sono molto soddisfatto.
